comment: Description: ScanD -- Process failed to start
Description: SIGD -- License failed to load
Sample: Cannot start the signature update for 'IPS'
Description: SIGD -- Failed to the start signature update for the specified services
Format: Cannot start the signature update for '%s'
Sample: Cannot complete the version check
Description: SIGD -- Failed to check the available signature version on the server
Format: Cannot complete the version check
Sample: Cannot start the signature update process
Description: SIGD -- Signature update process failed to start
Format: Cannot start the signature update process
Description: SIGD -- Signature update process crashed
Description: SIGD -- Signature update process started
Sample: Scheduled DLP update for version (4.94) completed
Description: SIGD -- Signature update process completed
Sample: Manual DLP update for version(4.94) failed (Valid feature key not available)
Description: SIGD -- Signature update process for the specified version failed
Sample: Device already has the latest DLP signature version (4.94)
Description: SIGD -- Device has the latest signature version for specified service
Format: Device already has the latest %s signature version (%s)
Sample: "Certificate for SAML is changed, please update SP certificate on IdP server."
Description: The certificate used by SAML is changed and admin need to update this certificate to IDP server
Format: "Certificate for SAML is changed, please update SP certificate on IdP server."
